Author: jl777c#5810
Content: anybody can lock their KMD and issue new stablecoins, so the coin issuance is fully decentralized

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: similarily, anybody can liquidate accounts that have too little equity left

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all enforced by blockchain

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the locked KMD itself goes into a large multisig (7 of 13), running on the top notary nodes with an automatic withdraw processing. all the deposit side is fully automated by the blockchain based on user transactions

Author: Markus#5464
Content: @jl777c how would the kmd loan towards stable coins be calculated?

Author: Markus#5464
Content: Can it be used to gain more kmd?

Author: Markus#5464
Content: If kmd price is 2$ and i have 10k kmd, thats 20k, if kmd price decrease to 1$ will i now be able to get 20k kmd from the loan swap?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: liquidators are converting the stablecoins back to KMD

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if you can predict the prices accurately, you would be able to trade against the blockchain and make money

Author: Markus#5464
Content: Alright thats cool

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this provides the liquidity to people

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: and liquidators are set to get 5% in arbitrage, so there should be an active set of liquidators

Author: Markus#5464
Content: When u return the USDK are they getting burned?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: deposit KMD and borrow stable coins against that collateral

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: pay back a loan and the stablecoins are converted back into KMD

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: all using the DTO (decentralized trustless oracle)

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for prices

Author: Markus#5464
Content: will there be a swap fee?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: transaction fees and there is some percentage on liquidation that goes into the system

Author: Markus#5464
Content: Also will there be only kmd loans or are u able to loan other coins aswell towards USDK?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: we havent finalized all the exact fees

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: KMD works very good for the coin to use as there needs to be a multisig signers for the withdraws and using KMD, they can earn the rewards. for other coins, there is no financial incentive for the multisig signers

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: technically it is possible to use any BTC protocol coin and also to be a stablecoin for any fiat
